item.title: Luminous Necklace
item.description: A necklace that shows different light colors according to your mood and preference.

item.title: Special Effect Makeup
item.description: Using prosthetic sculpting, molding and casting techniques to create advanced cosmetic effects. Burn effect Frostbite effect Severed finger Slash on face Zombie Prosthetics Whimsical maquette

item.title: What Makes You
item.description: How are you feeling today? What Makes You asks passengers to reflect on their emotions and identity.

item.description: Photographic documentation of my wandering in New York City
